resources.string: Java is powering the innovation behind our digital world. Harness this potential with Java resources for student coders, hobbyists, developers, and IT leaders.

Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including structured (particularly procedural), object-oriented and functional programming. It is often described as a "batteries included" language due to its comprehensive standard library

C is a general-purpose computer programming language. It was created in the 1970s by Dennis Ritchie, and remains very widely used and influential.
